entry.title: Greenville
entry.content: After watching shows about chef Sean Brock, I figured I'd take a trip down to Greenville to visit Husk. The city has its charm and I can see why many people I know choose to live here.

entry.title: Ceviche at Maido
entry.content: Japan meets Peru in the best way. Maido was on the World's 50 Best Restaurants. The food was expertly prepared and absolutely delicious. My favourite was the 50 Hour Short Rib.

entry.title: Cliffs of Faroe Islands
entry.content:
It was a bit of a hike to get here. Much of the Faroe Islands haven't had many tourists.

As a result, there's not a clear path to get here. We got here and it was very window. I was scared to get too close to the edge for fear of getting blown into the water.
